name: SimonSays
0:
”Alexa, play the Simon Says game”
”Alexa, let's play the Simon Says game”
”Alexa, open the Simon Says game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the simon says game
des: Play a game of Simon Says with Alexa! She will be giving out some random instructions, only do those that starts with "Simon Says". If she didn't say "Simon Says" and you did the action, you are out. Say "next" for the next instruction and "stop" to finish the game. If you didn't hear the instruction clearly, you can always check the card displayed in the Alexa app for the text version. Have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
